GK19padyavlu:28: śailī mṛt-kaṇatāṃ tṛṇaṃ kuliśatāṃ vajraṃ tṛṇa-kṣīṇatām /

GK19padyavlu:39: kubjāyāḥ kim u nāma rūpam adhikaṃ kiṃ tat sudāmno dhanam /
GK19padyavlu:40: vaṃśaḥ ko vidurasya yādavapater ugrasya kiṃ pauruṣaṃ

GK19padyavlu:43: anucitam ucitaṃ vā karma ko'yaṃ vibhāgo
GK19padyavlu:46: dvayam api sa maheśo nirviśeṣaṃ bibharti //9//
GK19padyavlu:51: kṛtam akṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca sarvam //10//
GK19padyavlu:53: kāṣāyān na ca bhojanādi-niyamān no vā vane vāsato

GK19padyavlu:65: yāvat kṣud asti jaṭhare jaraṭhā pipāsā
GK19padyavlu:85: caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ hṛdayam idam ākṛṣya hariṇā

GK19padyavlu:91: svārājyaṃ pratipadya nirbhayam amī muktā bhavantu dvijāḥ /

GK19padyavlu:103: vaktuṃ nāmni taveśvarābhilaṣite brūmaḥ kim anyat param //20//
GK19padyavlu:116: aiśvaryaṃ yac cetanā vā yad aṃśaḥ /

GK19padyavlu:136: svargārthīyā vyavasitir asau dīnayaty eva lokān

GK19padyavlu:178: kṛṣṇa rāma mukunda vāmana vāsudeva jagadguro
GK19padyavlu:179: matsya kacchapa nārasiṃha varāha rāghava pāhi mām /
GK19padyavlu:183: he gopālaka he kṛpā-jala-nidhe he sindhu-kanyā-pate
GK19padyavlu:184: he kaṃsāntaka he gajendra-karuṇā-pārīṇa he mādhava /

GK19padyavlu:196: śrī-govinda mukunda sundara-tano māṃ dīnam ānandaya //38//
GK19padyavlu:269: bhiṣag iva kuśalaṃ no dātum āyāti śauriḥ //51//
GK19padyavlu:277: śrī-viṣṇoḥ śravaṇe parīkṣid abhavad vaiyāsakiḥ kīrtane

GK19padyavlu:279: akrūras tv abhivandane kapi-patir dāsye 'tha sakhye 'rjunaḥ

GK19padyavlu:292: tvad-bhaktaḥ saritāṃ patiṃ culukavat khadyotavad bhāskaraṃ
GK19padyavlu:293: meruṃ paśyati loṣṭravat kim aparaṃ bhūmeḥ patiṃ bhṛtyavat /

GK19padyavlu:297: mīmāṃsā-rajasā malīmasa-dṛśāṃ tāvan na dhīr īśvare

GK19padyavlu:308: nāmāni praṇayena te sukṛtināṃ tanvanti tuṇḍotsavaṃ

GK19padyavlu:323: nṛtyan vāyu-vighūrṇitaiḥ sva-viṭapair gāyann alīnāṃ rutair

GK19padyavlu:353: na dhyāto'si na kīrtito'si na manāg ārādhito'si prabho

GK19padyavlu:366: tvam eko gatir nas tvam eko gatir naḥ //70//
GK19padyavlu:384: nāhaṃ vipro na ca narapatir nāpi vaiśyo na śūdro

GK19padyavlu:399: dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ

GK19padyavlu:405: sandhatte na ca yoga-siddhiṣu dhiyaṃ mokṣaṃ ca nākāṅkṣati /
GK19padyavlu:409: sandhyā-vandana bhadram astu bhavato bhoḥ snāna tubhyaṃ namo
GK19padyavlu:410: bho devāḥ pitaraś ca tarpaṇa-vidhau nāhaṃ kṣamaḥ kṣamyatām /

GK19padyavlu:415: yo bhavāni sa bhavāni kiṃ tataḥ /

GK19padyavlu:485: na dhanaṃ na janaṃ na sundarīṃ

GK19padyavlu:611: he mātur mathure tvam eva niyataṃ dhanyāsi bhūmī-tale

GK19padyavlu:716: kva yāsi nanu caurike pramuṣitaṃ sphuṭaṃ dṛśyate

GK19padyavlu:740: mātuḥ paścād aharata harir jātu haiyaṅgavīnam // 143 //
GK19padyavlu:749: vāraṃ vāraṃ viśāle diśi diśi vikiran locane lolatāre

GK19padyavlu:753: śambho svāgatam āsyatām ita ito vāmena padmodbhava
GK19padyavlu:754: krauñcāre kuśalaṃ sukhaṃ surapate vitteśa no dṛśyate /

GK19padyavlu:811: śaureḥ sambhramayann imā vijayate sākūta-veṇur dhvaniḥ //156//
GK19padyavlu:833: yan manāg api niśamya kā vadhūr
GK19padyavlu:847: akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
GK19padyavlu:849: sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ
GK19padyavlu:850: mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛhakṛtyo na lagate //163//

GK19padyavlu:866: na hi lagati muhūrtaṃ kiṃ vidheyaṃ na jāne //166//
GK19padyavlu:908: bhartur bhajantu guravaḥ pitaraś ca lajjām /
GK19padyavlu:911: svāmī kupyati kupyatāṃ parijanā nindanti nindantu mām,
GK19padyavlu:912: anyat kiṃ prathatām ayaṃ ca jagati prauḍho mamopadravaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:913: āśāsyaṃ punar etad eva yad idaṃ cakṣuś ciraṃ vardhatāṃ
GK19padyavlu:928: argho namo bhavatu me saha tena yūnā
GK19padyavlu:944: tathāpi taralāśaye na vimatāsi ko durgrahaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:946: manāg api mano na me sumukhi dhairyam ālambate //182//
GK19padyavlu:953: satyaṃ jalpasi duḥsahāḥ khala-giraḥ satyaṃ kulaṃ nirmalaṃ
GK19padyavlu:954: satyaṃ niṣkaruṇo'py ayaṃ sahacaraḥ satyaṃ sudūre sarit /
GK19padyavlu:955: tat sarvaṃ sakhi vismarāmi jhaṭiti śrotrātithir jāyate
GK19padyavlu:960: dvayas tava navaṃ navaṃ vapur apūrva-līlāmayam /
GK19padyavlu:961: alaṃ sumukhi nidrayā vraja gṛhe'pi naktaṃ carī
GK19padyavlu:971: smaraty antaḥśūnyā murahara gatāyām api niśi /
GK19padyavlu:992: rādhe tvayā mahad akāri tapo yad eṣa
GK19padyavlu:995: vatsān na cārayati vādayate na veṇum
GK19padyavlu:1002: tvāṃ yācate yadi bhaja vraja-nāgari tvaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1003: sādhyaṃ kim anyad adhikaṃ bhuvane bhavatyāḥ //193// rāṅgasya //
GK19padyavlu:1017: kiṃ vā brūmas tvad-abhisaraṇe sāhasaṃ mādhavāsyāḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1038: asmin kuñje vināpi pracalati pavanaṃ vartate ko'pi nūnaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1039: paśyāmaḥ kiṃ na gatvety anusarati gaṇe bhīta-bhīte'rbhakāṇām /
GK19padyavlu:1040: tasmin rādhāsakho vaḥ sukhayatu vilasan krīḍayā kaiṭabhārir
GK19padyavlu:1043: atha krīḍānantaraṃ tatra jānatīnāṃ sakhīnāṃ narmoktiḥ
GK19padyavlu:1046: iti nigadati vṛnde yoṣitāṃ pāntu yuṣmān
GK19padyavlu:1050: kṛṣṇa tvad-vanamālayā saha kṛtaṃ kenāpi kuñjāntare
GK19padyavlu:1051: gopī-kuntala-barha-dāma tad idaṃ prāptaṃ mayā gṛhyatām /
GK19padyavlu:1055: atha rādhayā saha dināntare keliḥ tatra sakhī-vākyam
GK19padyavlu:1064: tad-dūrād ayam añjaliḥ kim adhunā dṛgbhaṅgi-bhāvena te
GK19padyavlu:1072: āhūtādya mayotsave niśi gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ vimucyāgatā
GK19padyavlu:1073: kṣīvaḥ preṣyajanaḥ kathaṃ kulavadhūr ekākinī yāsyati /
GK19padyavlu:1074: vatsa tvaṃ tad imāṃ nayālayam iti śrutvā yaśodā-giro
GK19padyavlu:1077: gacchāmy acyuta darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptir utpadyate
GK19padyavlu:1078: kiṃ tv evaṃ vijana-sthayor hata-janaḥ sambhāvayaty anyathā /
GK19padyavlu:1080: āśliṣyan pulakotkarāñcita-tanur gopīṃ hariḥ pātu vaḥ //207//
GK19padyavlu:1089: atha punar anyedyur abhisārikā tatra sakhī-vākyam /
GK19padyavlu:1092: asmān mandira-karmatas tava karau nādyāpi viśrāmyataḥ
GK19padyavlu:1093: kiṃ brūmo rasaikāgraṇīr asi ghaṭī neyaṃ vilamba-kṣamā //209 //
GK19padyavlu:1097: maryādaiva vilaṅghitā pathi punaḥ keyaṃ kalindātmajā /
GK19padyavlu:1098: ākṣiptā khala-dṛṣṭir eva sahasā vyālāvalī kīdṛśī
GK19padyavlu:1099: prāṇā eva samarpitāḥ sakhi ciraṃ tasmai kim eṣā tanuḥ //210//
GK19padyavlu:1102: kaṇṭhān mauktika-mālikāṃ tad anu ca tyaktvā padaiḥ pañcamaiḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1104: tanvaṅgī nirupāyam adhvani paraṃ śreṇībharaṃ nindati // 211 //
GK19padyavlu:1108: nirbandhaṃ mama puṣpa-maṇḍana-vidhau nādyāpi kiṃ muñcati /
GK19padyavlu:1110: tad gopendra-kumāram atra milita-prāyaṃ manaḥ śaṅkate //212//
GK19padyavlu:1113: sakhi sa vijito vīṇā-vādyaiḥ kayāpy apara-striyā
GK19padyavlu:1114: paṇitam abhavat tābhyāṃ tava kṣapā-lalitaṃ dhruvam /
GK19padyavlu:1119: aratir iyam upaiti māṃ na nidrā
GK19padyavlu:1120: gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān /
GK19padyavlu:1134: dṛṣṭā kopa-vidhāyi maṇḍanam idaṃ prātaś ciraṃ preyaso
GK19padyavlu:1141: kṛtaṃ mithyā-jalpair virama viditaṃ kāmuka cirāt
GK19padyavlu:1142: priyāṃ tām evoccair abhisara yadīyair nakha-padaiḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1143: vilāsaiś ca prāptaṃ tava hṛdi padaṃ raga-bahulair
GK19padyavlu:1144: mayā kiṃ te kṛtyaṃ dhruvam akuṭilācāra-parayā //217//
GK19padyavlu:1148: asmākam asti na hi kaścid ihāvakāśas
GK19padyavlu:1158: durāśā yātā me pariṇatir iyaṃ prāṇitum api /
GK19padyavlu:1174: bhavatu viditaṃ chadmālāpair alaṃ priya gamyatāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1175: tanur api na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhis tu parāṅmukhaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1176: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannam imāṃ daśāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1177: prakṛti-capale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hata-jīvite // 223 //
GK19padyavlu:1179: kas tvaṃ tāsu yadṛcchayā kitava yās tiṣṭhanti gopāṅganāḥ
GK19padyavlu:1180: premāṇaṃ na vidanti yās tava hare kiṃ tāsu te kaitavam /
GK19padyavlu:1181: eṣā hanta hatāśayā yad abhavaṃ tvayy ekatānā paraṃ
GK19padyavlu:1182: tenāsyāḥ praṇayo'dhunā khalu mama prāṇaiḥ samaṃ yāsyati // 224 //
GK19padyavlu:1191: premāvagāhana-kṛte mānaṃ mā kuru cirāya karabhoru /
GK19padyavlu:1192: nākarṇi kiṃ nu mugdhe jātaṃ pīyūṣa-manthane garalam //226//
GK19padyavlu:1193: vidhumukhi vimukhībhāvaṃ bhāvini mad-bhāṣaṇe mā gāḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1198: punar api saiva katha gataḥ sa kālaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1205: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kim iti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1217: bhrū-bhaṅgo guṇitaś ciraṃ nayanayor abhyastam āmīlanaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1218: roddhuṃ śikṣitam ādareṇa hasitaṃ maune'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1219: dhairyaṃ kartum api sthirīkṛtam idaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19padyavlu:1220: baddho māna-parigrahe parikaraḥ siddhis tu daive sthitā // 231 //
GK19padyavlu:1225: vaṃśīravo yadi na mām avaśīkaroti //232// kasyacit //
GK19padyavlu:1236: murāriṃ paśyantyāḥ sakhi sakalam aṅgaṃ na nayanaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1238: samaṃ tenālāpaṃ sapadi racayantyā mukham ayaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1248: niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlam unmathyate
GK19padyavlu:1249: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate /
GK19padyavlu:1250: aṅgaṃ śoṣam upaiti pāda-patitaḥ preyāṃs tathopekṣitaḥ
GK19padyavlu:1251: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇam ākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ //237//
GK19padyavlu:1253: mānaja-viraheṇa dhyāyantīṃ tāṃ prati kasyāścid vākyam /
GK19padyavlu:1255: nāsāgre nayanaṃ yad etad aparaṃ yac caikatānaṃ manaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1256: maunaṃ cedam idaṃ ca śūnyam akhilaṃ yad viśvam ābhāti te
GK19padyavlu:1257: tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kim asi bhoḥ kiṃ viyoginy api //238//
GK19padyavlu:1261: varam iha viraho na tu saṅgamas tasya /
GK19padyavlu:1266: sañjāte virahe kayāpi hṛdaye sandānite cintayā
GK19padyavlu:1272: śiraś chāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayam akṛta rādhā-caraṇayor
GK19padyavlu:1274: iti krīḍā-kope nibhṛtam ubhayor apy anunaya-
GK19padyavlu:1275: prasādau jīyās tām api guru-samakṣaṃ sthitavatoḥ //241//
GK19padyavlu:1285: tava tu hṛdaye śīte'py evaṃ sadaiva sukhāptaye
GK19padyavlu:1286: mama sahacarī sā niḥsnehā manāg api na sthitā //243//
GK19padyavlu:1291: jñātvā sparśa-vaśāt tayā kila sakhī-bhrānty eva vakṣaḥ śanaiḥ
GK19padyavlu:1303: puṣpa-cchalena kṛṣṇam anveṣayantīṃ rādhāṃ prati kasyāścid uktiḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1309: tatra yamunā-tīre gatayā rādhayā saha saṃkathā /
GK19padyavlu:1310: kā tvaṃ mādhava-dūtikā vadasi kiṃ mānaṃ jahīti priye
GK19padyavlu:1311: dhūrtaḥ so'nyamanā manāg api sakhi tvayy ādaraṃ nojjhati /
GK19padyavlu:1313: nītvā kuñja-gṛhaṃ prakāśitatanuḥ smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ //248//
GK19padyavlu:1315: vasantaḥ sannaddho vipinam ajanaṃ tvaṃ ca taruṇī
GK19padyavlu:1317: vraja tvaṃ vā rādhe kṣaṇam atha vilambasva yadi vā
GK19padyavlu:1318: sphuṭaṃ jātas tāvac catura-vacanānām avasaraḥ //249// kasyacit //
GK19padyavlu:1320: svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanam idaṃ bālāham ekākinī
GK19padyavlu:1322: tan me sundara kṛṣṇa muñca sahasā vartmeti rādhā-giraḥ
GK19padyavlu:1323: śrutvā tāṃ parirabhya manmatha-kalāsakto hariḥ pātu vaḥ // 250 //
GK19padyavlu:1332: ete lakṣmaṇa jānakī-virahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayanty ambudā
GK19padyavlu:1333: marmāṇīva ca ghaṭṭayanty alam amī krūrāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1335: serṣyaṃ śaṅkitayā sa vaḥ sukhayatu svapnāyamāno hariḥ //252//
GK19padyavlu:1338: nīcair nyāsād atha caraṇayor nūpura mūkayantī
GK19padyavlu:1341: smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkato mādhavasya //253//
GK19padyavlu:1347: yad vāsare murali me karuṇāṃ karoṣi //254//
GK19padyavlu:1349: śūnyatvaṃ hṛdaye salāghavam idaṃ śuṣkatvam aṅgeṣu me
GK19padyavlu:1351: tat kiṃ no murali prayaccasi pnar govinda-vaktrāsavaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1352: yaṃ pītvā bhuvanaṃ vaśe vidadhatī nirlajjam udgāyasi //255//
GK19padyavlu:1361: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa-rāga-hatayā kiñcin na dṛṣṭaṃ mayā
GK19padyavlu:1362: tenādya skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK19padyavlu:1363: ekas tvaṃ viṣameṣu khinna-manasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir
GK19padyavlu:1364: gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśam avatād goṣṭhe harir vaś ciram // 257 //
GK19padyavlu:1367: SD 4.14; Smv 2.93; different kinds of vyaṅgya)
GK19padyavlu:1382: nyastāmīlita-dṛṣṭi gopa-vapuṣo viṣṇor mukhaṃ pātu vaḥ //260//
GK19padyavlu:1393: dhārādhvāna-manoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi dāmodaraḥ // 262 //
GK19padyavlu:1399: viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kim api na sakhī me gaṇayati //263//
GK19padyavlu:1410: ekenaiva cirāya kṛṣṇa bhavatā govardhano'yaṃ dhṛtaḥ
GK19padyavlu:1411: śrānto'si kṣaṇam āssva sāmpratam amī sarve vayaṃ dadhmahe /
GK19padyavlu:1413: nyañcac-chaila-bharārdite viruvati smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ //265//
GK19padyavlu:1421: dūraṃ dṛṣṭi-pathāt tirobhava harer govardhanaṃ vibhratas
GK19padyavlu:1422: tvayy āsakta-dṛśaḥ kṛśodari kara-srasto'sya mā bhūd ayam /
GK19padyavlu:1433: uttiṣṭhārāt tarau me taruṇi mama taroḥ śaktir ārohaṇe kā
GK19padyavlu:1434: sākṣād ākhyāmi mugdhe taraṇim iha raver ākhyayā kā ratir me /
GK19padyavlu:1435: vārteyaṃ nau-prasaṅge katham api bhavitā nāvayoḥ saṅgamārthā
GK19padyavlu:1439: navyā ca naur iti vacas tava tathyam eva /
GK19padyavlu:1441: tvaṃ cañcalo yad iha mādhava nāviko'si //270//
GK19padyavlu:1446: yan mādhava tvam asi samprati karṇadhāraḥ //271//
GK19padyavlu:1458: payaḥ-pūraiḥ pūrṇā sapadi gataghūrṇā ca pavanair
GK19padyavlu:1461: harir vāraṃ vāraṃ tad api karatāliṃ racayati //274//
GK19padyavlu:1465: jīvāmi cet punar ahaṃ na tadā kadāpi
GK19padyavlu:1480: hā kiṃ vidheyam adhunā sakhi nanda-sūnur
GK19padyavlu:1483: Extra verse found in only one edition.
GK19padyavlu:1490: pūrṇeyaṃ tarir ambubhir na hi hareḥ śaṅkā kalaṅkād api /
GK19padyavlu:1491: kāṭhiṇyaṃ bhaja nādya sundari vayaṃ rādhe prasādena te
GK19padyavlu:1494: gūḍhāṅga kiṃ nanu vṛthā kitava prayāhi /
GK19padyavlu:1499: aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭaṃ praharati kuṭile mādhavaḥ kiṃ vasanto
GK19padyavlu:1500: no cakrī kiṃ kulālo na hi dharaṇī-dharaḥ kiṃ dvijihvaḥ phaṇīndraḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1501: nāhaṃ ghorāhi-mardī kim asi khaga-patir no hariḥ kiṃ kapīśo
GK19padyavlu:1502: rādhā-vāṇībhir itthaṃ prahasita-vadanaḥ pātu vaś cakra-pāṇiḥ // 281//
GK19padyavlu:1505: kas tvaṃ bho niśi keśavaḥ śirasijai :
GK19padyavlu:1507: bhadre śaurir ahaṃ guṇaiḥ pitṛ-gataiḥ putrasya kiṃ syād iha /
GK19padyavlu:1508: cakrī candramukhi prayacchasi na me kuṇḍīṃ ghaṭīṃ dohanīm
GK19padyavlu:1509: itthaṃ gopa-vadhū-jitottaratayā hrīṇo hariḥ pātu vaḥ //282//
GK19padyavlu:1511: vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1513: yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
GK19padyavlu:1514: śaurir gopavadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃvidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ //283//
GK19padyavlu:1516: rādhe tvaṃ kupitā tvam eva kupitā ruṣṭāsi bhūmer yato
GK19padyavlu:1517: mātā tvaṃ jagatāṃ tvam eva jagatāṃ mātā na vijño'paraḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1518: devi tvaṃ parihāsa-keli-kalahe'nantā tvam evety asau
GK19padyavlu:1519: smero vallava-sundarīm avanamac chauriḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt //284//
GK19padyavlu:1549: duṣṭaḥ ko'pi karoti vaḥ paribhavaṃ śaṅke muhur gokule
GK19padyavlu:1550: dhāvantyaḥ skhalad-ambaraṃ niśi vane yūyaṃ yad-abhyāgatāḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1552: dordaṇḍe mama bhāti dīvyata pati-kroḍe kuraṅgī-dṛśaḥ //290//
GK19padyavlu:1554: kā vas tṛṣṇā valati hṛdaye durmadeyaṃ satīnām /
GK19padyavlu:1555: sīmantinyaḥ spṛhayata gṛhān mā viruddhaṃ kurudhvaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1556: nāyaṃ dṛṣṭau mama vighaṭate hanta puṇyasya panthāḥ // 291 //
GK19padyavlu:1559: prasīda svāṃ śiṣyām atikhilamukhīṃ śādhi muralīm /
GK19padyavlu:1560: harantī maryādāṃ śiva śiva pare puṃsi hṛdayaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1561: nayantī dhṛṣṭeyaṃ yaduvara yathā nāhvayati naḥ //292 //
GK19padyavlu:1568: kālindyāḥ pulineṣu keli-kupitām utsṛjya rāse rasaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1575: tulasi vilasasi tvaṃ malli jātāsi phullā
GK19padyavlu:1577: kathayata bata sakhyaḥ kṣipram asmāsu kasmin
GK19padyavlu:1580: dṛṣṭaḥ kvāpi sa mādhavo vraja-vadhūm ādāya kāñcid gataḥ
GK19padyavlu:1581: sarvā eva hi vañcitāḥ sakhi vayaṃ so'nveṣaṇīyo yadi /
GK19padyavlu:1582: dve dve gacchatam ity udīrya sahasā rādhāṃ gṛhītvā kare
GK19padyavlu:1583: gopī-veśa-dharo nikuñja-kuharaṃ prāpto hariḥ pātu vaḥ //296//
GK19padyavlu:1586: adoṣād doṣād vā tyajati vipine tāṃ yadi bhavān
GK19padyavlu:1587: abhadraṃ bhadraṃ vā tribhuvana-pate tvāṃ vadatu kaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1588: idaṃ tu krūraṃ me smarati hṛdayaṃ yat kila tayā
GK19padyavlu:1616: anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1617: vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ //302//
GK19padyavlu:1629: saujanyena vaśīkṛtā vayam atas tvāṃ kiñcid ācakṣmahe
GK19padyavlu:1630: kālindīṃ yadi yāsi sundari punar mā gāḥ kadambāṭvaīm /
GK19padyavlu:1632: lagne locanasīmni notpaladṛśaḥ paśyantī patyur gṛham //304//
GK19padyavlu:1634: śyāmo'yaṃ divasaḥ payoda-paṭalaiḥ sāyaṃ tathāpy utsukā
GK19padyavlu:1635: puṣpārthaṃ sakhi yāsi yāmuna-taṭaṃ yāhi vyathā kā mama /
GK19padyavlu:1636: kintv ekaṃ khara-kaṇṭaka-kakṣatam urasy ālokya sadyo'nyathā
GK19padyavlu:1637: śaṅkāṃ yat kuṭilaḥ kariṣyati jano jātāsmi tenākulā // 305 //
GK19padyavlu:1639: gantavyā te manasi yamunā vartate cet tadānīṃ
GK19padyavlu:1640: kuñjaṃ mā gāḥ sahaja-sarale vāñjulaṃ mad-vacobhiḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1641: gacches tatrāpy ahaha yadi vā mā murārer udāre
GK19padyavlu:1654: sakhyo yayr gṛham ahaṃ kalasīṃ vahantī
GK19padyavlu:1657: mokṣyāmi jīvanam idaṃ sahasā puras te //309//
GK19padyavlu:1660: valgantyā vana-mālayā tava hṛtaṃ vakṣojayoś candanaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1662: klāntā svaira-taraṅga-kelibhir iyaṃ tanvī ca dhūrte tanuḥ

GK19padyavlu:1679: spaṣṭam eṣā rahasyatvāj jānadbhir api nocyate //
GK19padyavlu:1680: tābhir nitya-vihāram eva tanute vṛndāvane mādhavo
GK19padyavlu:1681: goṣṭhāmbhojamukhībhir itya bhi manāk proce priyāyai haraḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1682: līlāratna-rahasyatā vrajapater bhūyasy aho paśya yat
GK19padyavlu:1683: tattvajño'pi purāntare ca gamanaṃ vyācaṣṭa vaiyāsakiḥ //
GK19padyavlu:1684: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai vyājahāra haro rahaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1688: sakhyaṃ tvayā vapur idaṃ gamitaṃ varākyāḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1692: prasthānaṃ valayaiḥ kṛtaṃ priyasakhair ajasraṃ gataṃ
GK19padyavlu:1693: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇam āsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1694: gantuṃ niścita-cetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19padyavlu:1695: gantavye sati jīvita-priya-suhṛt-sārthaḥ kim u tyajyate // 314 //
GK19padyavlu:1711: sāndrānandam anantam avyayam ajaṃ yad yogino'pi kṣaṇaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1712: sākṣāt kartum upāsate pratidinaṃ dhyānaikatānāḥ param /
GK19padyavlu:1713: dhanyās tā vrajavāsināṃ yuvatayas tad brahma yāḥ kautukād
GK19padyavlu:1727: gacchan dūram apekṣito muhur asau vyāvṛtya paśyann api /
GK19padyavlu:1728: tac chūnye punar āgatāsmi bhavane prāṇās ta eva sthitāḥ
GK19padyavlu:1729: sakhyaḥ paśyata jīvita-praṇayinī dambhād ahaṃ rodimi // 319//
GK19padyavlu:1757: dalati hṛdayaṃ gāḍhodvegaṃ dvidhā na tu bhidyate
GK19padyavlu:1758: vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mūrcchāṃ na muñcati cetanām /
GK19padyavlu:1759: jvalayati tanūm antardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt
GK19padyavlu:1760: praharati vidhir marmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam //325//
GK19padyavlu:1765: virahiṇi jane mūrcchāṃ labdhvā vinodayati vyathā-

GK19padyavlu:1769: dṛṣṭaṃ ketaka-dhūli-dhūsaram idaṃ vyoma kramād vīkṣitāḥ
GK19padyavlu:1771: sakhyaḥ saṃvṛṇutāśru muñcata bhayaṃ kasmān mudevākulā

GK19padyavlu:1775: tad yāmunaṃ taṭam idaṃ vipinaṃ tad etat /
GK19padyavlu:1796: kiṃ tv ekam eva mama duḥkham abhūd analpaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1797: prāṇeśvareṇa sahito yad ayaṃ na yātaḥ //332///
GK19padyavlu:1800: rakṣāmi jīvam avadhir niyato yadi syāt /
GK19padyavlu:1802: yat kāla-kūṭam asṛjat tad idaṃ kim artham //333//
GK19padyavlu:1805: prakaṭaya śaśinn āśāḥ kāmaṃ manoja samullasa /

GK19padyavlu:1809: nāyāti ced yadupatiḥ sakhi naitu kāmaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1811: ekaḥ paraṃ hṛdi mahān mama vajra-pāto
GK19padyavlu:1812: bhūyo yad induvadanaṃ na vilokitaṃ tat // 335 //
GK19padyavlu:1814: pañcatvaṃ tanur etu bhūta-nivahāu svāṃśe viśantu sphuṭaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1815: dhātāraṃ praṇipatya hanta śirasā tatrāpi yāce varam /
GK19padyavlu:1826: tāmbūlaṃ sva-mukhārdhaṃ carvitam itaḥ ko me mukhe nikṣiped
GK19padyavlu:1827: unmārga-prasṛtaṃ ca cāṭu-vacanaiḥ ko māṃ vaśe sthāpayet /
GK19padyavlu:1829: keli-srasta-śikhaṇḍakaṃ mama punar vyādhūya badhnātu kaḥ // 338//
GK19padyavlu:1833: yadi nibhṛtam araṇyaṃ prāntaraṃ vāpy apānthaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1845: āvirbhāva-dine na yena gaṇito hetus tanīyān api
GK19padyavlu:1846: kṣīyetāpi na cāparādha-vidhinā natyā nayo vardhate /
GK19padyavlu:1848: premṇas tasya guroḥ kathaṃ nu karavai vāṅ-niṣṭhatā-lāghavam //341//
GK19padyavlu:1852: bhūyo bhūyaḥ praṇatibhir idaṃ kiṃ tu yāce vidheyā
GK19padyavlu:1853: smāraṃ smāraṃ svajana-gaṇane kvāpi rekhā mamāpi //342//
GK19padyavlu:1869: svarābhir gopībhir diśi diśi samudghūrṇam aniśam //345 //
GK19padyavlu:1882: kalyāṇaṃ kathayāmi kiṃ sahacari svaireṣu śaśvat purā
GK19padyavlu:1883: yasyā nāma samīritaṃ muraripoḥ prāṇeśvaīti tvayā /
GK19padyavlu:1884: sāhaṃ premabhidābhayāt priyatamaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi dūtaṃ prabhoḥ
GK19padyavlu:1885: sandiṣṭāsmi na veti saṃśayavatī pṛcchāmi no kiñcana //348//
GK19padyavlu:1905: prāṇas tvaṃ jagatāṃ harer api purā saṅketa-veṇu-svanān
GK19padyavlu:1906: ādāya vraja-subhruvām iha bhavān mārgopadeśe guru /
GK19padyavlu:1907: haṃho mathurā-niṣkuṭānila sakhe sampraty api śrī-pater
GK19padyavlu:1919: aṃse veṇī kuca-parisare candanaṃ vāci maunaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1920: tasyāḥ sarvaṃ sthitam iti na ca tvāṃ vinā kvāpi cetaḥ //354//
GK19padyavlu:1926: kṣīrodīyati manmatho dṛgapi ca drāk candrakāntīyati //355//
GK19padyavlu:1928: (Spd 3480, Smv 44.10; SKM 2.36.1 first two lines somewhat different)
GK19padyavlu:1929: asyās tāpam ahaṃ mukunda kathayāmy eṇīdṛśas te kathaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1930: padminyāḥ sarasaṃ dalaṃ vinihitaṃ yasyāḥ satāpe hṛdi /
GK19padyavlu:1931: ādau śuṣyati saṅkucaty anu tataś cūrṇatvam āpadyate
GK19padyavlu:1932: paścān murmuratāṃ dadhad dahati ca śvāsāvadhūtaḥ śikhī //356//
GK19padyavlu:1937: sphoṭaḥ syād iti nāṅgakaṃ malayaja-kṣodāmbhasā sicyate /
GK19padyavlu:1938: syād asyātibharāt parābhava iti prāyo na vā pallavā-
GK19padyavlu:1939: ropo vakṣasi tat katha kṛśatanor adhiḥ samādhīyatām // 358 //
GK19padyavlu:1952: galaty ekā mūrcchā bhavati punar anyā yad anayoḥ
GK19padyavlu:1953: kim apy āsīn madhyaṃ subhaga nikhilāyām api niśi /
GK19padyavlu:1957: citrāya tvayi cintite tanubhuvā cakre tatajyaṃ dhanur-
GK19padyavlu:1958: vartiṃ dhartum upāgate'ṅguli-yuge bāṇo guṇe yojitaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:1959: prārabdhe tava citra-karmaṇi dhanur muktāstra-bhinnā bhṛśaṃ
GK19padyavlu:1960: bhittiṃ drag avalambya keśava ciraṃ sā tatra citrāyate //362//
GK19padyavlu:1963: yāvad dorvalayaṃ karoti rabhasād agre samāliṅgitum /
GK19padyavlu:1964: tāvat taṃ nijam eva deham acirād aliṅgya romāñcitāṃ
GK19padyavlu:1965: dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṭijalacchalena ruditaṃ manye payodair api //363//
GK19padyavlu:1967: acchinnaṃ nayanāmbu bandhuṣu kṛtaṃ tāpaḥ sakhīṣv āhito
GK19padyavlu:1968: dainyaṃ nyastam aśeṣataḥ parijane cintā gurubhyo'rpitā /
GK19padyavlu:1969: adya śvaḥ kila nirvṛtiṃ vrajati sā śvāsaiḥ paraiḥ khidyate
GK19padyavlu:1970: visrabdho bhava viprayoga-janitaṃ duḥkhaṃ vibhaktaṃ tayā //364//
GK19padyavlu:2002: kāmaṃ kāmayate na keli-nalinīṃ nāmodate kaumudī-
GK19padyavlu:2003: nisyandair na samīhate mṛga-dṛśām ālāpa-līlām api /
GK19padyavlu:2005: aṅgais tāmyati cetasi vrajavadhūm ādhāya mugdho hariḥ // 370 //
GK19padyavlu:2011: umāpatidharasya // (SKM 1.61.1; UN 14.184; Jīva and VCT to BRS 2.4.178)
GK19padyavlu:2013: kenālīkam idaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe mudhā tāmyasi /
GK19padyavlu:2014: ity utsavapna-paramparāsu śayane śrutvā giraṃ śārṅgiṇo
GK19padyavlu:2015: rukmiṇyā śithilīkṛtaḥ sakapataṃ kaṇṭha-grahaḥ pātu vaḥ //372//
GK19padyavlu:2019: kenālīkam idaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe mudhā tāmyasi /
GK19padyavlu:2020: itthaṃ svapna-paramparāsu śayane śrutvā giraṃ śārṅgiṇaḥ
GK19padyavlu:2021: savyājaṃ śithilīkṛtaḥ kamalayā kaṇṭha-grahaḥ pātu vaḥ // kasyacit //
GK19padyavlu:2030: pāntha dvāravatīṃ prayāsi yadi he tad devakīnandano
GK19padyavlu:2036: te govardhana-kandarāḥ sa yamunā-kacchaḥ sa ceṣṭāraso
GK19padyavlu:2037: bhāṇḍīraḥ sa vamaspatiḥ sahacarās te tac ca goṣṭhāṅganam /
GK19padyavlu:2038: kiṃ dvāravatī-bhujaṅga hṛdayaṃ nāyāti doṣair apīty
GK19padyavlu:2039: avyād vo hṛdi duḥsahaṃ vraja-vadhū-sandeśa-śalyaṃ hareḥ //375 //
GK19padyavlu:2042: santāpaṃ na harantu nāma nitarāṃ kurvanti kasmāt punaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:2047: mā gā ity apamaṅgalaṃ vraja sakhe snehena śūnyaṃ vacaḥ
GK19padyavlu:2048: tiṣṭheti prabhutā yathābhilapitaṃ kurv ity udāsīnatā /
GK19padyavlu:2049: brūmo hanta mudāma mitra vacanaṃ naivopacārād idaṃ
GK19padyavlu:2050: smartavyā vayam ādareṇa bhavatā yāvad bhavad-darśanam //377//
GK19padyavlu:2053: tad-gehaṃ nata-bhitti mandiram idaṃ labdhāvakāśaṃ divaḥ
GK19padyavlu:2054: sā dhenur jaratī caranti kariṇām etā ghanābhā ghaṭāḥ /
GK19padyavlu:2055: sa kṣudro muṣala-dhvaniḥ kalam idaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitāṃ
GK19padyavlu:2056: citraṃ hanta kathaṃ dvijo'yam iyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //378// kasyacit //
GK19padyavlu:2064: bāhū sīdata eva kampa-vidhurau śaktau na kaṇṭha-grahe /
GK19padyavlu:2070: kiṃ pādānte luṭhasi vimanāḥ svāmino hi svatantrāḥ
GK19padyavlu:2071: kañcit kālaṃ kvacid abhiratas tatra kas te'parādhaḥ /
GK19padyavlu:2072: āgaskāriṇy aham iha yayā jīvitaṃ tad-viyoge
GK19padyavlu:2073: bhartṛ-prāṇāḥ striya iti nanu tvaṃ mamaivānuneyaḥ //381//
GK19padyavlu:2076: yaḥ kaumāra-haraḥ sa eva hi varas tā eva caitra-kṣapās
GK19padyavlu:2083: tathāhaṃ sā rādhā tad idam ubhayoḥ saṅgama-sukham /
GK19padyavlu:2089: mugdhe muñca viṣādam atra balabhit kampo gurus tyajyatāṃ
GK19padyavlu:2090: sad-bhāvaṃ bhaja puṇḍarīka-nayane mānyān imān mānaya /
GK19padyavlu:2092: ity anya-pratiṣedham ātmani vidhiṃ śṛṇvan hariḥ pātu vaḥ //384//
GK19padyavlu:2115: kṛtaṃ na sukṛtaṃ mayā kṛtam aho mahā-duṣkṛtaṃ
GK19padyavlu:2116: kṛtānta-nagare gatir bhavatu me tatra kīdṛśī /
GK19padyavlu:2117: na bho na dinabhoga-dig-bhramaṇam asmāt paraṃ punas
GK19padyavlu:2118: tathā kuru yathā taṭe tava ghaṭeta vāso mama //
